00113   class FullNameComparer
00114   {
00115   private:
00116       string x;
00117   public:
00118       FullNameComparer(const string & s){ x = s; }
00119       ~FullNameComparer() {};
00120       string X() { return x; }
00121       bool operator ()(parent_component_proxy *arg) { return arg->name() == X(); }
00122   };
00123   virtual bool is_traversable() { return false; }
00124   
00125 };

00132 
00133 int uvm_ml_utils::implement_create_child_junction_node(const string & component_type_name,
00134                                                        const string & instance_name,
00135                                                        const string & parent_full_name,
00136                                                        int            parent_framework_id,
00137                                                        int            parent_junction_node_id) {
00138 
00139     // The parent proxy with the given parent_full_name might already exist if the parent junction node
00140     // instantiates multiple SystemC child components. Hence. first thing, check if it exists:
00141     parent_component_proxy * proxy = parent_component_proxy::FindProxyById(parent_junction_node_id);
00142     if (proxy == NULL)
00143         proxy = parent_component_proxy::Create(parent_full_name, parent_framework_id, parent_junction_node_id);
00144     return proxy->AddNode(component_type_name, instance_name);
00145 }

00154 parent_component_proxy::parent_component_proxy(const sc_module_name & nm): uvm_ml_special_component(nm),
00155                                                                            m_proxy_id(0), m_parent_framework_id(0) {
00156 }
00157 
00158 parent_component_proxy * parent_component_proxy::Create(const string & parent_full_name, // Static method
00159                                                         int            parent_framework_id,
00160                                                         int            parent_junction_node_id) {
00161 
00162     parent_component_proxy * ret = NULL;
00163 
00164     size_t first_dot = parent_full_name.find(".");
00165 
00166     if(first_dot == string::npos || (UVM_ML_DOTTED_NAME_SUPPORTED() == true)) {
00167         string parent_name;
00168          
00169         sc_object * obj = sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_curr();
00170         if (obj != NULL) {
00171             // Can happen if that's a SC "sandwich"
00172             parent_name = parent_full_name.substr(strlen(obj->name()) + 1); // remove also dot
00173         }
00174         else
00175             parent_name = parent_full_name;
00176 
00177         UVM_ML_ENABLE_DOTTED_NAME()
00178         ret =  new parent_component_proxy(sc_module_name(parent_name.c_str()));
00179         UVM_ML_RESTORE_ENABLE_DOTTED_NAME()
00180     }
00181     else {
00182         // Need to build auxiliary dummy hierarchy in order to work around the fact 
00183         // that the instance name cannot be dotted
00184         ret = create_proxy_with_helpers(NULL, parent_full_name);
00185     }
00186     if (ret != NULL) {
00187         ret->SetParentFrameworkId(parent_framework_id);
00188         ret->SetId(parent_junction_node_id);
00189         parent_proxies[parent_junction_node_id] = ret;
00190     }
00191     return ret;
00192 }
00193 
00194 int parent_component_proxy::AddNode(const string & child_type_name, 
00195                                     const string & child_instance_name) {
00196     int node_id = -1;
00197 
00198     simcontext()->hierarchy_push( this );
00199     uvm_component * comp = uvm_factory::create_component(child_type_name, name(), child_instance_name);
00200     simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00201     if (comp) {
00202       node_id = uvm_ml_utils::add_quasi_static_tree_node(comp);
00203     }
00204     return node_id;
00205 }
00206 
00207 parent_component_proxy * parent_component_proxy::FindProxyById(int parent_junction_node_id)
00208 {
00209     return parent_proxies[parent_junction_node_id];
00210 }

00216 uvm_ml_proxy_helper::uvm_ml_proxy_helper(const sc_module_name & name): uvm_ml_special_component(name),m_proxy(0) {
00217 }
00218 
00219 uvm_ml_proxy_helper::uvm_ml_proxy_helper(const sc_module_name & nm, const string & remaining_path): uvm_ml_special_component(nm) {
00220   size_t dot_pos = remaining_path.find(".");
00221 
00222   if (dot_pos == string::npos) {
00223     m_proxy = new parent_component_proxy(sc_module_name(remaining_path.c_str()));
00224     // Save it because the helper may be later deleted
00225   } else {
00226     string next_instance_name = remaining_path.substr(0, dot_pos);
00227     string next_remaining_path = remaining_path.substr(dot_pos + 1);
00228     uvm_ml_proxy_helper * child_helper = 
00229       new uvm_ml_proxy_helper(sc_module_name(next_instance_name.c_str()), next_remaining_path);
00230     m_proxy = child_helper->get_proxy();
00231   }
00232 }
00233 
00234 UVM_COMPONENT_REGISTER( uvm_ml_proxy_helper)
00235 
00236 // Find an existing hierarchical tree for the new parent proxy
00237 // To substitute missing hierarchical instances (belonging to foreign languages) - create dummy helper components
00238 // The latter is done in a recursive manner
00239 
00240 parent_component_proxy * parent_component_proxy::create_proxy_with_helpers(sc_module *    parent_helper,
00241                                                                            const string & path)
00242 {
00243   parent_component_proxy * proxy = NULL;
00244 
00245   size_t remaining_path_pos = path.find(".");
00246 
00247   if (remaining_path_pos == string::npos) {
00248       if (parent_helper)
00249           sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_push(parent_helper);
00250       proxy = new parent_component_proxy(sc_module_name(path.c_str()));
00251       if (parent_helper)
00252           sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00253   } else {
00254       // The helpers and the proxy must be instantiated recursively in order to build the correct full path
00255       string instance_name = path.substr(0,remaining_path_pos);
00256       string full_name;
00257       if (parent_helper == NULL)
00258           full_name = instance_name;
00259       else {
00260           full_name = string(parent_helper->name()) + "." + instance_name;
00261       }
00262       string remaining_path = path.substr(remaining_path_pos+1);
00263 
00264       sc_object * old_object = sc_find_object(full_name.c_str());
00265 
00266       if (old_object == NULL) {
00267           if (parent_helper)
00268               sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_push(parent_helper);
00269           
00270           uvm_ml_proxy_helper * helper = new uvm_ml_proxy_helper(sc_module_name(instance_name.c_str()), remaining_path);
00271           if (parent_helper)
00272               sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00273           proxy = helper->get_proxy();
00274       }
00275       else {
00276         sc_module * old_module = dynamic_cast<sc_module *>(old_object);
00277         assert (old_module != NULL);
00278 
00279         proxy = create_proxy_with_helpers(old_module, remaining_path);
00280       }
00281   }
00282   return proxy;
00283 }

00286 
00287 static vector<child_component_proxy *>child_proxies;
00288 
00289 child_component_proxy * uvm_ml_create_component(const string &        target_framework_indicator, 
00290                                                 const string &        component_type_name, 
00291                                                 const string &        instance_name,
00292                                                 const uvm_component * parent)
00293 {
00294     string parent_name;
00295   
00296     parent_name = parent->name();
00297 
00298     // Child component proxy should be created statically when used with the portable adapter (Questa SC)
00299 
00300 #ifndef MTI_SYSTEMC
00301     //    child_component_proxy *p = new child_component_proxy(instance_name.c_str(), target_framework_indicator, component_type_name, instance_name, parent_name);
00302     child_component_proxy *p = DCAST<child_component_proxy *> (uvm_factory::create_component("child_component_proxy", parent->name(), instance_name));
00303     if (p && (p->request_create_child_junction_node(target_framework_indicator, component_type_name, instance_name, parent_name) == true))
00304       child_proxies.push_back(p);
00305 #else
00306     string proxy_name = parent_name + uvm_ml_utils::get_systemc_separator() + instance_name;
00307 
00308     sc_object * obj = sc_find_object(proxy_name.c_str());
00309     child_component_proxy *p = DCAST<child_component_proxy *>(obj);
00310     
00311     if (p == NULL) {
00312       char msg[1024];
00313       sprintf(msg, "\n Child component proxy full name: %s\n", proxy_name.c_str());
00314       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC portable adapter: Child component proxy was not created statically", msg);
00315       return NULL;
00316     }
00317     if (p->request_create_child_junction_node(target_framework_indicator, component_type_name, instance_name, parent_name) == true)
00318       child_proxies.push_back(p);
00319 #endif
00320     return p;
00321 }

00329 static map<uvm_component*,unsigned>proxy_parents;
00330 
00331 int unsigned get_hierarchical_node_id(uvm_component *comp) {
00332   static int unsigned next_id = 0;
00333   map<uvm_component*, unsigned>::iterator it;
00334   
00335   it = proxy_parents.find(comp);
00336   if(it == proxy_parents.end()) {
00337     proxy_parents.insert(pair<uvm_component*,unsigned>(comp,next_id++));
00338     return next_id-1;
00339   } else
00340     return it->second;
00341 
00342 } // get_hierarchical_node_id
00343 
00344     child_component_proxy::child_component_proxy(sc_module_name nm): uvm_ml_special_component(nm),m_child_junction_node_id(0),m_parent_id(0) 
00345 {
00346 }
00347 
00348 child_component_proxy::child_component_proxy(sc_module_name nm, 
00349                                              const string & target_framework_indicator, 
00350                                              const string & component_type_name, 
00351                                              const string & instance_name,
00352                                              const string & parent_name): uvm_ml_special_component(nm) 
00353 {
00354     if (request_create_child_junction_node(target_framework_indicator, component_type_name, instance_name, parent_name) == true) {
00355         child_proxies.push_back(this);
00356     }
00357 }
00358 
00359 bool child_component_proxy::request_create_child_junction_node(const string & target_framework_indicator, 
00360                                                                const string & component_type_name, 
00361                                                                const string & instance_name,
00362                                                                const string & parent_name)
00363 {
00364     m_parent_name = parent_name; // It must be assigned ouside of the constructor for the statically created components (portable adapter)
00365     m_component_type_name = component_type_name;
00366     m_instance_name = instance_name;
00367     m_target_frmw_ind = target_framework_indicator;
00368 
00369     uvm_component *p = get_parent();
00370     m_parent_id = get_hierarchical_node_id(p);
00371     m_child_junction_node_id = BP(create_child_junction_node)(uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId(),
00372                                                               m_target_frmw_ind.c_str(), 
00373                                                               m_component_type_name.c_str(),
00374                                                               m_instance_name.c_str(),
00375                                                               m_parent_name.c_str(),
00376                                                               m_parent_id);
00377     if(m_child_junction_node_id == -1) {
00378       char msg[1024];
00379       sprintf(msg,"\ntype name is %s; instance name is %s; framework is %s", m_component_type_name.c_str(), m_instance_name.c_str(), m_target_frmw_ind.c_str());
00380       UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: Failed to create child proxy", msg);
00381       return false;
00382     }
00383     return true;
00384 }
00385 
00386 void child_component_proxy::transmit_phase(uvm_phase *phase, unsigned int action)
00387 {
00388     if (phase->get_phase_type() != UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE) {
00389         char * phase_name  = const_cast<char*>(phase->get_name().c_str());
00390         char * phase_group = const_cast<char*>(phase->get_schedule()->basename());
00391 
00392         int res = BP(transmit_phase)(uvm_ml_utils::FrameworkId(), m_target_frmw_ind.c_str(), m_child_junction_node_id, phase_group, phase_name, (uvm_ml_phase_action) action);
00393         if(res == 0) {
00394             char msg[1024];
00395             sprintf(msg, "UVM-SC adapter: phase %s failed for foreign child component %s", phase_name, name());
00396             uvm_ml_utils::report_sc_error(msg, "");
00397         }
00398     }
00399 }
